GSD.product_version: versions from v3.3 to before v5.4.125
GSD.description:
net: caif: fix memory leak in cfusbl_device_notify

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.125 by commit 4d94f530cd24c85aede6e72b8923f371b45d6886, it was introduced in version v3.3 by commit 7ad65bf68d705b445ef10b77ab50dab22be185ee. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: caif: fix memory leak in cfusbl_device_notify
